Text: If you want to see what Peter Parker would look like if he was a junkie take a look at this issue.Thank god for Mr. Dillon's wonderful artwork...
Thanks! I really like this cover. Great quality upload as always.

This issue was ill-conceived. I feel like the writing isn't much better than the artwork Mirrormaster. :(

It is a nice cover though.
Story was meh.  Cover is even more meh but thanks for the upload.
